noun.definition: All the visible features of an area of countryside or land.
noun.example: The landscape changed as we drove north.

noun.definition: The orientation of a page that is wider than it is high.

verb.definition: Improve the aesthetic appearance of (a piece of land) by changing its contours, planting trees and shrubs, etc.
verb.example: The site has been tastefully landscaped.

usage_examples: We plan to landscape the backyard next spring.
